document.full_text: bp  chief executive bob dudley said on friday talks were ongoing about its planned share swap with russian group rosneft  and he was optimistic about a resolution.
document.title: bp ceo sees rosneft share swap solution over time
lines_and_colors: bp  chief executive bob dudley said on friday talks were ongoing about its planned share swap with russian group rosneft  and he was optimistic about a resolution.
